content: चिकुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Moving, tremulous, fickle, unsteady. {@--2@} Inconsiderate, rash. --रः {@--1@} The hair of the head; मम रुचिरे चिकुरे कुरु मानद…कुसुमानि <ls>Gīt. 12</ls>; so घनचयरुचिरे रचयति चिकुरे तरलिततरुणानने <ls n="Gīt.">7.</ls> {@--2@} A mountain. {@--3@} A musk-rat. {@--4@} A reptile, snake.
